alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Rusk; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 9:15AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Attoyac Bayou Near Chireno affecting Nacogdoches, Shelby, San Augustine and Rusk Counties. For the Attoyac Bayou...including Chireno...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Attoyac Bayou Near Chireno. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Expect minor lowland flooding of boat ramps and pastures. Move livestock and equipment to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 6.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 18.3 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 915 AM CDT.
